property.name: FlowFile Count
property.description: Number of FlowFiles to concatenate together

property.name: Minimum Number of Entries
property.description: The minimum number of files to include in a bundle

property.name: Maximum Number of Entries
property.description: The maximum number of files to include in a bundle

property.name: Minimum Group Size
property.description: The minimum size for the bundle

property.name: Maximum Group Size
property.description: The maximum size for the bundle. If not specified, there is no maximum.

property.name: Max Bin Age
property.description: The maximum age of a Bin that will trigger a Bin to be complete. Expected format is <duration> <time unit> where <duration> is a positive integer and time unit is one of seconds, minutes, hours

property.name: Maximum number of Bins
property.description: Specifies the maximum number of bins that can be held in memory at any one time

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: If the bundle cannot be created, all FlowFiles that would have been used to created the bundle will be transferred to failure

relationship.name: merged
relationship.description: The FlowFile containing the merged content

relationship.name: original
relationship.description: The FlowFiles that were used to create the bundle

property.name: Name
property.description: Arbitrary Name

property.name: Sensitive
property.description: Sensitive Property with no real meaning

property.name: Count Service
property.description: The Controller Service to use for counting

property.name: Event Sleep Duration
property.description: The amount of time to sleep when the onPrimaryNodeChange event occurs

property.name: URLs to Load
property.description: URLs to load onto the classpath

property.name: Class to Load
property.description: The name of the Class to load

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: FlowFiles are routed to this relationship if the specified class cannot be loaded

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: FlowFiles are routed to this relationship if the specified class can be loaded

property.name: Always Required
property.description: This property is always required

property.name: Always Optional
property.description: This property is always optional

property.name: Required If Optional Property Set
property.description: This property is required if and only if the 'Always Optional' property is set (to anything)

property.name: Required If Optional Property Set To Foo
property.displayName: Required If Optional Property Set To Foo
property.description: This property is required if and only if the 'Always Optional' property is set to the value 'foo'

property.name: Required If Always Required Is Bar Or Baz
property.displayName: Required If Always Required Is Bar Or Baz
property.description: This property is required if and only if the 'Always Required' property is set to the value 'bar' or the value 'baz'

property.name: Second Level Dependency
property.description: Depends on 'Required If Optional Property Set To Foo'

dependency.propertyName: Required If Optional Property Set To Foo
dependency.propertyDisplayName: Required If Optional Property Set To Foo

property.name: Multiple Dependencies
property.description: Depends on Always Required = foo AND Always Optional = bar

extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.tests.system.DoNotTransferFlowFile
extension.description: Pulls FlowFile from queue and ignores it, intentionally neglecting to transfer it to any relationship. This is intended for verifying behavior in System Tests only

property.name: Output Count
property.description: The number of FlowFiles to output for each input

property.name: URLs to Load
property.description: URLs to load onto the classpath

property.name: Class to Load
property.description: The name of the Class to load

property.name: Sleep Duration
property.description: Amount of time to sleep in the onTrigger method

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: FlowFiles are routed to this relationship if the specified class cannot be loaded

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: FlowFiles are routed to this relationship if the specified class can be loaded

property.name: Successful Verification
property.description: Whether or not Verification should succeed

property.name: Verification Steps
property.description: The number of steps to use in the Verification

property.name: Exception on Verification
property.description: If true, attempting to perform verification will throw a RuntimeException

property.name: Failure Node Number
property.description: The Node Number to Fail On

property.name: FlowFile Context
property.description: The value of the property will be evaluated with FlowFile attributes

property.name: Variable Registry Context
property.description: The value of the property will be evaluated with only with the Variable Registry

property.name: Expression Language Not Evaluated
property.description: The value of the property will be evaluated without evaluating Expression Language

property.name: Fake Service
property.description: The Fake Service Being Tested

property.name: File Size
property.description: The size of the file that will be used

property.name: Batch Size
property.description: The number of FlowFiles to be transferred in each invocation

property.name: Max FlowFiles
property.description: The maximum number of FlowFiles to generate. Once the Processor has generated this many FlowFiles, any additional calls to trigger the processor will produce no FlowFiles until the Processor has been stopped and started again

property.name: Text
property.description: If Data Format is text and if Unique FlowFiles is false, then this custom text will be used as content of the generated FlowFiles and the File Size will be ignored. Finally, if Expression Language is used, evaluation will be performed only once per batch of generated FlowFiles

property.name: State Scope
property.description: Whether to store state locally or in cluster

property.name: File to Write on Commit Failure
property.displayName: File to Write on Commit Failure
property.description: Specifies a file to write in the event that ProcessSession commit fails

property.name: Filename
property.description: Fully qualified path to the file that should be ingested

property.name: Commit Mode
property.description: How to commit the process session

property.name: Delete File
property.description: Whether or not the file should be deleted after successfully ingesting

property.name: Count
property.description: The number of times to loop

property.name: Number of Output FlowFiles
property.description: The number of Output FlowFiles

extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.tests.system.ReOrderFlowFiles
extension.description: Selects FlowFiles that match the given criteria and transfers them to the 'success' relationship. Then, selects all other FlowFiles and transfers them to the success relationship. Note that this Processor will not work properly if it is scheduled to run while its incoming queue(s) are being populated. This is meant to be used only for purposes of testing in a Stateless execution engine and makes use of FlowFileFilters.

property.name: First Group Selection Criteria
property.description: An Expression Language expression that evaluates to true or false. FlowFiles that evaluate to true will be transferred first; others will be transferred after.

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: All FlowFiles are transferred to this relationship.

property.name: Filename
property.description: Fully qualified path to the file that should be ingested

property.name: Number of Relationships
property.description: The number of Relationships

property.name: Validate Sleep Time
property.description: The amount of time to sleep during validation

property.name: @OnScheduled Sleep Time
property.description: The amount of time to sleep when scheduled

property.name: onTrigger Sleep Time
property.description: The amount of time to sleep during each trigger

property.name: @OnStopped Sleep Time
property.description: The amount of time to sleep when stopped

property.name: Sleep Service
property.description: Controller Service that sleeps

property.name: Use Clone
property.description: Whether or not to use session.clone for generating children FlowFiles

property.name: Throw Exception
property.description: If true, the processor will throw an exception for each FlowFile that is processed

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: All FlowFiles are routed to this Relationship

property.name: Text
property.description: The text of the ProcessException
property.defaultValue: ProcessException thrown intentionally for system test

property.name: Batch Size
property.description: The number of FlowFiles to transfer at once.

property.name: Insufficient Batch Size Strategy
property.description: Specifies how to handle the situation in which there are fewer FlowFiles available than the configured Batch Size

allowableValue.description: If there are not enough FlowFiles available to satisfy the batch size, whatever is available will be transferred to the 'success' relationship
If there are not enough FlowFiles available to satisfy the batch size, whatever is available will be transferred to the 'failure' relationship
If there are not enough FlowFiles available to satisfy the batch size, no FlowFiles will be transferred

property.name: Content
property.description: Content to set

property.name: Update Strategy
property.description: How to update the contents

property.name: Filename
property.description: A file that should exist

extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.tests.system.VerifyEvenThenOdd
extension.description: Ensures that all FlowFiles that are in the Processor's incoming queue are ordered such that the value of the key attribute is even for all FlowFiles before the first FlowFile with an odd value. If the FlowFiles are ordered correctly, they are transferred to the 'success' relationship; otherwise, they are transferred to the 'failure' relationship. The name of the key attribute is configurable. This is used to ensure that data is properly ordered while running within a Stateless flow.

property.name: Attribute Name
property.description: The name of the attribute to check for even or odd values

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: All FlowFiles are transferred to this relationship in the event that any queued FlowFiles are not ordered correctly.

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: All FlowFiles are transferred to this relationship in the event that all queued FlowFiles are ordered correctly.

property.name: Isolation Key
property.description: The key to use as the ClassLoader Isolation Key

property.name: File to Write
property.description: File to write the counts to

property.name: Class to Create
property.description: If specified, each iteration of #onTrigger will create an instance of this class in order to test ClassLoader behavior. If unable to create the object, the FlowFile will be routed to failure

property.name: Event File
property.description: Specifies the file to write to that contains a line of text for each lifecycle event that occurs

property.name: Filename
property.description: The file to write the FlowFile contents to

property.name: Successful Verification
property.description: Whether or not Verification should succeed

property.name: Verification Steps
property.description: The number of steps to use in the Verification

property.name: Exception on Verification
property.description: If true, attempting to perform verification will throw a RuntimeException

property.name: Failure Node Number
property.description: The Node Number to Fail On

property.name: Start
property.description: The value to start counting from

property.name: Filename
property.description: The File to write to

property.name: Text
property.description: The Text to Write

property.name: Count Service
property.description: The Count Service to Use

property.name: Successful Verification
property.description: Whether or not Verification should succeed

property.name: Verification Steps
property.description: The number of steps to use in the Verification

property.name: Exception on Verification
property.description: If true, attempting to perform verification will throw a RuntimeException

property.name: Failure Node Number
property.description: The Node Number to Fail On

property.name: parameters
property.description: Specifies parameters in a properties file format

property.name: Successful Verification
property.description: Whether or not Verification should succeed

property.name: Verification Steps
property.description: The number of steps to use in the Verification

property.name: Exception on Verification
property.description: If true, attempting to perform verification will throw a RuntimeException

property.name: Failure Node Number
property.description: The Node Number to Fail On

stateful.description: Stores the timestamp of the last initialization
